analysis: The project requires a mobile-responsive Egyptian-themed UI with light colors, desert aesthetics, and functional buttons. The current files need updates to incorporate an Egyptian color palette, mobile-friendly navigation, and ensure all buttons are working properly.

improvements.description: Update the CSS to include an Egyptian-themed color palette with light desert colors, such as sandy beige, golden yellows, and deep blues, and ensure all buttons have proper styling and hover effects.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon and ensure all buttons are properly linked and functional.
Implement the mobile menu toggle functionality with proper event handling, smooth transitions, and ensure all buttons work as expected.
